doc:
Naveen Andrews https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naveen_Andrews 0 Naveen William Sidney Andrews (born 17 January 1969) is a British actor. He is known for numerous roles, such as Sayid Jarrah in the television series Lost, Kip Singh in the film The English Patient and Sanjay in the 2002 remake of Rollerball. For his role on Lost, Andrews was nominated for a Golden Globe in 2006, a Primetime Emmy Award in 2005 and received the Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series in 2006. Naveen_William_Sidney_Andrews ( born 17_January_1969 ) is a_British_actor . He is_known for numerous_roles , such_as Sayid_Jarrah in the_television_series_Lost , Kip_Singh in the_film The_English_Patient and Sanjay in the_2002_remake of Rollerball . For his_role on Lost , Andrews was_nominated for a_Golden_Globe in 2006 , a_Primetime_Emmy_Award in 2005 and received the_Screen_Actors_Guild_Award for Outstanding_Performance by an_Ensemble in a_Drama_Series in 2006 .
